Toca Life World: Build a Story has been a world-renowned casual RPG ever since it globally launched. The game does a great job at empowering the players unleash their inner creativity in one of the most advanced city-builders. Create your own world, put your own characters, and embark on adventures where you‚Äôre the main lead. Take mesmerizing vacations, get captivated by the diverse landscapes, and slowly increase your net worth. Toca Life World: Build a Story is available as a free-to-play game on APKZonic.

In this article for Toca Life World: Build a Story, we will be sharing some of the core tips and tricks that can help new players achieve their goals over time without compromising on fun. We all love the fact that the game does not have a solidified ‚Äúend point‚Äù. In fact, Toca Boca, the developers have been quite adamant on providing players with new free expansions that are themed over the current happenings, be it festivals or anniversary. Plus, these tips should help you enough as a new player since there is literally nothing said in stone regarding what to do in the beginning of your adventures.

¬†

Tip1: Top Things to Do in this Fairy Tale World

Toca Life World: Build a Story has a lot of things going for them, a fantastical fictional world, adept and diverse range of characters, and more. Create your very own city at the start. Construct more buildings and unleash your creativity as you design the city. One of the best parts about these buildings are that they work and function just like any city-builder RPG. There is no questing to do, neither there is a beginner mission set that you can follow. Simply do your own thing, that‚Äôs the motto of the game. No hand-holding comes with its own set of benefits, such as adding your own characters, creating their own storyline, and controlling the scenarios how you like.

¬†

Tip2: Explore Secrets Hidden in this Majestic World!

Toca Life World: Build a Story has some of the best written characters and NPCs, as acclaimed by many of the veterans. The developers have put in a lot of work to ensure players find it entertaining to talk with them and unlock the secrets attached with them. Vague speaking‚Äôs are perhaps one of the best signs of detecting a hidden secret. These secrets can be either information or actual in-game resources as reward, depending on the toughness. They can be found at different locations. Some of the secrets are as follows:

üí° By tapping on bushes in Little Hill, players can locate a spot to conceal an item.

üí° By tapping on the tree branches in the park, players can locate the hidden eggs.

üí° Behind the ‚ÄúNo Sloth‚Äù poster, players can access a sloth costume that is concealed in the storage.

üí° One more secret that needs to be revealed by the players is to open the cupboard to reveal the hidden flowers on the mall‚Äôs first floor.

¬†

Tip3: Get a Secret Pet for Free!

That‚Äôs right! You can get a free Secret Trumpet, or Secret Pet in Toca Life World: Build a Story. These are tiny and cute creatures that are quite hard to collect and get access for in the game. They have not much usage in-game but Secret pets are more viewed as collector‚Äôs items that only veterans know about. The trick to finding and collecting more Secret Pets is by ensuring the right combination of character and items they are holding is met. These conditions are extremely tough to crack and many Secret Pets are still hidden from the public. Go to the Storage area with specific characters and holding certain items to lure in these cute furry creatures.

¬†

Tip4: Get Tons of Gifts!

The post office gives gifts to players, but is it possible to receive gifts unlimited times? Yes, players do receive fresh gift tokens each time they restart the game by shutting it down, and that‚Äôs a great feature. Players can therefore exit the game, relaunch it, visit the post office, and obtain a fresh gift token in order to amass an infinite number of gifts.

¬†

Tip5: Create Your Very Own Actors

Since of the core selling points of Toca Life World: Build a Story is to sell players the dream of creating and managing their own characters, it‚Äôs not out of the box to think they actually managed to do that! To make your world more realistic, you need to fill them with more characters. Each could be similar or diverse, entirely depending on your choice. The ability to customize your characters to your tastes is a feature of this game. However, you have the option to access pre-designed characters anywhere you like if you feel that your creativity is insufficient for creating the characters.

While it‚Äôs nice to have access to the early characters, making your own character brings you much more happiness and excitement. You can alter a character‚Äôs height, age, choice of clothing and accessories, and facial features when you create them in the game. However, there exists a limit on how freely you can create characters in the game. This cap or limit can only be lifted if you choose to purchase the creator package.
